leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 结构生物-功能/位点/相互作用预测生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 表征→功能/位点→相互作用→解释→benchmark
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 模型库 + 数据集 + 评测

unit.unit_name: 位点/口袋/结合位点预测

queries: [WEB] protein binding pocket detection tools github
[WEB] deep learning ligand binding site prediction github

tools.name: BADGER-SBDD
tools.one_line_profile: Binding affinity guidance for diffusion models in structure-based drug design
tools.detailed_description: A framework implementing general binding affinity guidance for diffusion models to improve structure-based drug design (SBDD), ensuring generated molecules have high affinity.

tools.name: PocketVina
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated protein-ligand docking with automated pocket detection
tools.detailed_description: A GPU-accelerated docking tool that integrates automated pocket detection and multi-pocket conditioning to enhance protein-ligand docking efficiency and accuracy.

tools.name: EquiPNAS
tools.one_line_profile: Equivariant deep graph neural networks for protein-nucleic acid binding site prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning method using pLM-informed E(3) equivariant graph neural networks to predict binding sites between proteins and nucleic acids.

tools.name: GraphCDR
tools.one_line_profile: Graph neural network with contrastive learning for cancer drug response prediction
tools.detailed_description: A method utilizing graph neural networks and contrastive learning to predict the response of cancer cell lines to various drugs.

tools.name: DeepInteract
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric deep learning framework for predicting protein interface contacts
tools.detailed_description: A geometric transformer-based framework designed to predict contact interfaces between interacting proteins.

tools.name: DeepRefine
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric deep learning method for refining protein complex structures
tools.detailed_description: A tool leveraging geometric deep learning to assess and refine the 3D structures of protein complexes.

tools.name: GCDM-SBDD
tools.one_line_profile: Geometry-complete diffusion generative model for structure-based drug design
tools.detailed_description: A generative model using geometry-complete diffusion processes to design small molecules based on protein target structures.

tools.name: DeepDTIs_DBN
tools.one_line_profile: Deep belief net based drug-target interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning approach using Deep Belief Networks (DBN) to predict interactions between drugs and target proteins.

tools.name: Rag2Mol
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-based drug design using Retrieval Augmented Generation
tools.detailed_description: A method applying Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) techniques to the task of structure-based drug design.

tools.name: CaDRReS
tools.one_line_profile: Cancer Drug Response prediction using a Recommender System
tools.detailed_description: A recommender system-based approach for predicting the response of cancer subtypes to various drug treatments.

tools.name: BionoiNet
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-based software to classify ligand-binding sites
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of BionoiNet for classifying and characterizing ligand-binding sites in proteins.

tools.name: fpocket
tools.one_line_profile: Fast open source protein pocket detection algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A very fast, open-source protein pocket detection algorithm based on Voronoi tessellation, widely used for identifying potential binding sites.

tools.name: keypoint-diffusion
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion model for structure-based drug design with learned representations
tools.detailed_description: A diffusion-based model for generating drug candidates based on protein structures, utilizing learned representations for faster inference.

tools.name: DPASyn
tools.one_line_profile: Mechanism-Aware Drug Synergy Prediction via Dual Attention
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model for predicting drug synergy that incorporates mechanism-aware dual attention and precision-aware quantization.

tools.name: DeepConv-DTI
tools.one_line_profile: Prediction of drug-target interactions via deep learning with convolution
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model using convolutional neural networks on protein sequences to predict drug-target interactions.

tools.name: HoTS
tools.one_line_profile: Sequence-based prediction of binding regions and drug-target interactions
tools.detailed_description: A method for predicting both drug-target interactions and the specific binding regions on the protein sequence.

tools.name: Anchor
tools.one_line_profile: Transcription Factor Binding Site Prediction
tools.detailed_description: An algorithm for predicting transcription factor binding sites, originally a winning entry in the ENCODE-DREAM challenge.

tools.name: TamGent
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based Generative Solution for Structured-based Drug Design
tools.detailed_description: A Transformer-based generative model designed to tailor molecules for specific protein pockets in structure-based drug design.

tools.name: EquiBind
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric deep learning for fast predictions of protein-ligand binding structure
tools.detailed_description: A geometric deep learning model that directly predicts the 3D coordinates of a ligand bound to a protein receptor without expensive sampling.

tools.name: FlowSite
tools.one_line_profile: Harmonic Self-Conditioned Flow Matching for Multi-Ligand Docking and Binding Site Design
tools.detailed_description: A flow matching-based approach for multi-ligand docking and designing binding sites, enabling flexible protein-ligand interaction modeling.

tools.name: oncoPredict
tools.one_line_profile: R package for drug response prediction and drug-gene association prediction
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to predict in vivo drug response from in vitro screening data and identify drug-gene associations.

tools.name: otter-knowledge
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge-enhanced learned representation for drug target binding affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: A framework that enriches protein and drug representations with knowledge graphs to improve the accuracy of binding affinity predictions.

tools.name: KG4SL
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge graph neural network for synthetic lethality prediction
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network (GNN) model that leverages knowledge graphs to predict synthetic lethality pairs for cancer target discovery.

tools.name: CLAPE-SMB
tools.one_line_profile: Contrastive learning and pre-trained encoder for protein-small molecules binding sites prediction
tools.detailed_description: A method using contrastive learning and pre-trained encoders to predict binding sites for small molecules on proteins.

tools.name: match_ligand_binding_sites
tools.one_line_profile: Extract ligand binding sites from PDB and match to de novo scaffolds
tools.detailed_description: A utility to extract ligand binding motifs from the PDB and match them onto de novo designed protein scaffolds for functional protein design.

tools.name: EmerGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Emerging Drug Interaction Prediction Enabled by Flow-based Graph Neural Network
tools.detailed_description: A flow-based Graph Neural Network model designed to predict emerging drug-drug interactions using biomedical networks.

tools.name: KnowDDI
tools.one_line_profile: Accurate and Interpretable Drug-drug Interaction Prediction via Knowledge Subgraph Learning
tools.detailed_description: A method for predicting drug-drug interactions that provides interpretability through knowledge subgraph learning.

tools.name: PeSTo
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric deep learning method to predict protein binding interfaces
tools.detailed_description: A geometric deep learning tool (Protein Structure Transformer) for accurate prediction of protein-protein and other binding interfaces directly from structure.

tools.name: PeSTo-Carbs
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric Deep Learning for Prediction of Protein-Carbohydrate Binding Interfaces
tools.detailed_description: An extension of the PeSTo framework specifically trained to predict binding interfaces between proteins and carbohydrates.

tools.name: DrugLAMP
tools.one_line_profile: Drug-target interaction predictions utilizing multi-modal large language models
tools.detailed_description: A system utilizing multi-modal large language models to discern structural affinities and predict drug-target interactions.

tools.name: Affinity2Vec
tools.one_line_profile: Drug-target binding affinity prediction using representation learning
tools.detailed_description: A method combining representation learning, graph mining, and machine learning to predict drug-target binding affinities.

tools.name: DTiGEMSplus
tools.one_line_profile: Network-based method for computational Drug-Target Interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: A network-based tool for predicting drug-target interactions using graph embedding, graph mining, and similarity-based techniques.

tools.name: EEG-DTI
tools.one_line_profile: End-to-end heterogeneous graph learning framework for drug-target interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework utilizing heterogeneous graph representation learning to predict interactions between drugs and targets, facilitating drug discovery processes.

tools.name: POVME3
tools.one_line_profile: Pocket volume analyzer for protein modeling and binding site analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool for analyzing the shape and volume of ligand binding pockets in protein structures, often used in molecular dynamics simulations to track pocket dynamics.

tools.name: PaccMann Predictor
tools.one_line_profile: Bimodal neural networks for drug-target and drug-cell interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of multimodal deep learning models for predicting drug sensitivity (pharmacogenomics) and drug-target binding affinity (proteochemometrics).

tools.name: PointSite
tools.one_line_profile: Point cloud segmentation tool for protein ligand binding atom identification
tools.detailed_description: A tool that treats protein structures as point clouds and uses segmentation techniques to identify atoms involved in ligand binding, aiding in binding site prediction.

tools.name: SSM-DTA
tools.one_line_profile: Drug-target affinity prediction model addressing data scarcity
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model designed to predict drug-target binding affinity, specifically optimized to handle data scarcity issues in DTA datasets.

tools.name: PocketFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Autoregressive flow model for molecule generation in protein pockets
tools.detailed_description: A generative model that designs drug-like molecules fitting specific protein binding pockets, incorporating chemical knowledge into an autoregressive flow architecture.

tools.name: InteracDome
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to compute site-based ligand-binding frequencies
tools.detailed_description: A computational tool and resource for analyzing ligand-binding frequencies across protein domains, helping to identify functional binding sites based on structural data.

tools.name: VHELIBS
tools.one_line_profile: Validation helper for ligands and binding sites
tools.detailed_description: A software tool designed to assist in the validation and assessment of predicted ligand binding sites and ligand structures in computational chemistry workflows.

tools.name: fpocketR
tools.one_line_profile: Program to find drug-like RNA-ligand binding pockets
tools.detailed_description: A specialized tool for detecting potential small molecule binding pockets on RNA structures, adapted from protein pocket detection methodologies.

tools.name: DeepGS
tools.one_line_profile: Deep representation learning for drug-target binding affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework combining graph neural networks and sequence modeling to predict the binding affinity between drugs and target proteins.

tools.name: CLAPE
tools.one_line_profile: Contrastive learning encoder for protein-ligand binding sites prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model utilizing contrastive learning and pre-trained encoders to accurately predict protein-ligand binding sites from structural data.

tools.name: BindDM
tools.one_line_profile: Binding-adaptive diffusion models for structure-based drug design
tools.detailed_description: A generative diffusion model framework that adapts to binding site information for designing novel drug molecules based on protein structures.

tools.name: DSAC
tools.one_line_profile: Dual-branch network for transcription factor binding sites prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool combining local features and global representations to predict transcription factor binding sites on DNA sequences.

tools.name: FusionDTI
tools.one_line_profile: Token-level fusion module for drug-target interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: A predictive model for drug-target interactions that employs a token-level fusion mechanism to capture fine-grained interaction details between molecules and proteins.

tools.name: MINN-DTI
tools.one_line_profile: Mutual interaction neural network for DTI prediction
tools.detailed_description: A neural network framework designed to effectively predict drug-target interactions by modeling the mutual interactions between drug and target features.

tools.name: Chemogenomic-DTI-Prediction-Methods
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of algorithms for chemogenomic drug-target interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based repository containing implementations of various chemogenomic algorithms and methods for predicting drug-target interactions.

tools.name: DiffSBDD
tools.one_line_profile: Euclidean diffusion model for structure-based drug design
tools.detailed_description: A state-of-the-art generative diffusion model for generating ligand structures within protein binding pockets, operating in Euclidean space.

tools.name: GraphSite
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-DNA binding site prediction using graph transformers
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool that uses graph transformers on predicted protein structures to identify DNA binding sites.

tools.name: LMetalSite
tools.one_line_profile: Alignment-free metal ion-binding site prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting metal ion binding sites in proteins from sequence data using pretrained language models and multi-task learning, without requiring structural alignment.

tools.name: SAP_bare-protein
tools.one_line_profile: Calculation of Spatial Aggregation Propensity (SAP) from MD trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A set of FORTRAN codes and scripts to calculate the Spatial Aggregation Propensity of proteins based on solvent accessible surface area from GROMACS trajectories.

tools.name: DecompDiff
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion model with decomposed priors for structure-based drug design
tools.detailed_description: The official implementation of DecompDiff, a diffusion model framework that utilizes decomposed priors to improve structure-based drug design (SBDD) by generating 3D molecular structures conditioned on protein pockets.

tools.name: MDeePred
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-channel deep chemogenomic model for binding affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: A multi-channel deep learning framework for predicting receptor-ligand binding affinity in drug discovery, integrating chemogenomic data for improved accuracy.

tools.name: PoseCheck
tools.one_line_profile: Quality control and pose validation for SBDD methods
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to perform pose checks and validation for 3D structure-based drug design methods, ensuring generated molecules meet physical and chemical plausibility standards.

tools.name: DEPACT_PACMatch
tools.one_line_profile: De novo ligand-binding pocket design tools
tools.detailed_description: A set of programs (DEPACT and PACMatch) for the de novo design of ligand-binding pockets within protein scaffolds, facilitating protein engineering and functional design.

tools.name: bcpaff
tools.one_line_profile: Electron density-based geometric deep learning for binding affinity
tools.detailed_description: A tool exploring protein-ligand binding affinity prediction using electron density-based geometric deep learning techniques.

tools.name: SHREC 2022 Protein-Ligand Benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark dataset and evaluation tools for binding site recognition
tools.detailed_description: The official dataset and evaluation toolkit for the SHREC 2022 contest focused on protein-ligand binding site recognition, enabling standardized assessment of prediction algorithms.

tools.name: DrEval
tools.one_line_profile: Statistical evaluation toolkit for drug response prediction
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit designed to ensure that evaluations of drug response prediction models are statistically sound, biologically meaningful, and reproducible.

tools.name: CIGIN
tools.one_line_profile: Chemically interpretable graph interaction network for ADMET prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model (Chemically Interpretable Graph Interaction Network) for predicting pharmacokinetic properties (ADMET) of drug-like molecules, emphasizing interpretability.

tools.name: DeepPocket
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-based ligand binding site detection
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning approach for detecting ligand binding sites on protein surfaces, utilizing 3D convolutional neural networks.

tools.name: ReSimNet
tools.one_line_profile: Drug response similarity prediction network
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of ReSimNet, a Siamese neural network architecture designed to predict the similarity of drug responses between different cell lines or conditions.

tools.name: POVME
tools.one_line_profile: Pocket Volume Measurer for molecular simulations
tools.detailed_description: A tool to detect, characterize, and measure the volume of binding pockets from molecular dynamics simulation trajectories.

tools.name: PharmacoForge
tools.one_line_profile: Pharmacophore generation using diffusion models
tools.detailed_description: A tool that generates pharmacophores conditioned on a protein pocket using a diffusion model, aiding in structure-based drug design.

tools.name: CPA
tools.one_line_profile: Compositional Perturbation Autoencoder for single-cell drug response
tools.detailed_description: A deep generative framework (Compositional Perturbation Autoencoder) to learn and predict the effects of drug perturbations at the single-cell level, including unseen drug combinations.

tools.name: WaterKit
tools.one_line_profile: Prediction of water molecule placement in binding sites
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to predict the placement and energy of water molecules within ligand binding sites, which is critical for accurate docking and binding affinity estimation.

tools.name: Reinforced-Genetic-Algorithm
tools.one_line_profile: RL and GA hybrid for structure-based drug design
tools.detailed_description: A framework combining Reinforcement Learning and Genetic Algorithms for structure-based drug design tasks.

tools.name: FMol
tools.one_line_profile: Simplified drug discovery pipeline integrating AlphaFold and fpocket
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline tool that integrates AlphaSMILES, AlphaFold, and fpocket/Amber to automate the process of generating molecules, predicting protein structures, and assessing druggability.

tools.name: Pocket-to-Concavity
tools.one_line_profile: Refinement tool for protein-ligand binding site shapes
tools.detailed_description: A tool for refining the shape representation of protein-ligand binding sites derived from alpha-spheres, improving the definition of concavities for downstream analysis.

tools.name: OMTRA
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-task generative model for SBDD
tools.detailed_description: A multi-task generative model designed for Structure-Based Drug Design, capable of generating molecules that fit specific protein targets.

tools.name: DMFF-DTA
tools.one_line_profile: Dual modality feature fused network for DTA prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model (DMFF-DTA) that integrates binding site information with other modalities to predict drug-target binding affinity.

tools.name: PIDiff
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-informed diffusion model for pocket-specific generation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a physics-informed diffusion model designed to generate 3D molecular structures specifically tailored to protein pockets.

tools.name: DeepDTA
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning for drug-target binding affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: A widely used deep learning model for predicting drug-target binding affinity using sequence and SMILES representations.

tools.name: MOLI
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-omics late integration for drug response prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep neural network approach for drug response prediction that utilizes multi-omics data with a late integration strategy.

tools.name: YuelPocket
tools.one_line_profile: GNN-based protein-ligand binding site prediction
tools.detailed_description: A graph neural network-based method for predicting protein-ligand binding sites, leveraging structural information.

tools.name: DrugCell
tools.one_line_profile: Visible neural network for drug response prediction
tools.detailed_description: A visible neural network model that predicts drug response by simulating the hierarchical structure of a human cell, providing interpretability alongside prediction.

tools.name: MIRACLE
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-view graph contrastive learning for DDI prediction
tools.detailed_description: A model utilizing multi-view graph contrastive representation learning to predict drug-drug interactions (DDI).

tools.name: AMG
tools.one_line_profile: RL agent for fragment-based 3D molecular generation
tools.detailed_description: A deep reinforcement learning framework acting as an interaction agent to steer fragment-based 3D molecular generation specifically for protein pockets.

tools.name: SeFMol
tools.one_line_profile: Steering semi-flexible molecular diffusion for SBDD
tools.detailed_description: A method combining reinforcement learning with diffusion models to steer the generation of semi-flexible molecules in structure-based drug design.

tools.name: PrankWebApp
tools.one_line_profile: Web application for binding site analysis and visualization
tools.detailed_description: The source code for the PrankWeb application, which provides a platform for running P2Rank binding site predictions and visualizing the results on protein structures.

tools.name: Allopred
tools.one_line_profile: Prediction of allosteric pockets on proteins
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting allosteric pockets and sites on protein structures, aiding in the discovery of allosteric modulators.

tools.name: MPBind
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based protein binding site prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model utilizing transformer architectures for the prediction of protein binding sites.

tools.name: PUResNet
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for predicting protein-ligand binding sites
tools.detailed_description: A deep convolutional neural network based method for predicting protein-ligand binding sites from 3D protein structures.

tools.name: PUResNetV2.0
tools.one_line_profile: Updated deep learning model for ligand binding site prediction
tools.detailed_description: The second version of PUResNet for predicting ligand binding sites, offering improved performance and updated architecture.

tools.name: caviar
tools.one_line_profile: Protein cavity identification and subpocket decomposition tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for identifying protein cavities and automatically decomposing them into subpockets for detailed structural analysis.

tools.name: DrugHIVE
tools.one_line_profile: Deep hierarchical generative model for structure-based drug design
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for structure-based drug design using a hierarchical generative model to generate molecules fitting specific protein pockets.

tools.name: DLEPS
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Learning based Efficacy Prediction System for drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: A system for predicting drug efficacy using deep learning techniques, aiding in the drug discovery process.

tools.name: BiLevel-Graph-Neural-Network
tools.one_line_profile: Bi-Level Graph Neural Networks for Drug-Drug Interaction Prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Bi-Level Graph Neural Networks to predict interactions between drugs, presented at ICML 2020 Workshop.

tools.name: DeepPurpose
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive Deep Learning Toolkit for Drug Discovery
tools.detailed_description: A versatile toolkit for various drug discovery tasks including Drug-Target Interaction (DTI), Drug Property, PPI, and DDI prediction.

tools.name: MolTrans
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular Interaction Transformer for DTI Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A Transformer-based model for predicting Drug-Target Interactions by modeling molecular substructure interactions.

tools.name: DeepCDR
tools.one_line_profile: Cancer Drug Response Prediction via Hybrid GCN
tools.detailed_description: A hybrid graph convolutional network model for predicting cancer drug responses by integrating multi-omics data.

tools.name: deepsite-js
tools.one_line_profile: JavaScript implementation/interface for DeepSite binding site prediction
tools.detailed_description: An enhanced JavaScript-based implementation or interface for the DeepSite algorithm, used for predicting protein binding pockets.

tools.name: EPBD-BERT
tools.one_line_profile: Transcription factor binding site prediction using BERT
tools.detailed_description: A BERT-based model for predicting transcription factor binding sites on DNA sequences, aiding in mutation identification.

tools.name: egfr-att
tools.one_line_profile: Neural network for drug effect prediction
tools.detailed_description: A neural network model specifically designed for predicting drug effects, likely focused on EGFR inhibitors.

tools.name: LABind
tools.one_line_profile: Ligand-Aware Binding Site Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A method for identifying protein binding sites by learning interactions between ligands and proteins.

tools.name: DELPHI
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning for protein-protein binding site prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning approach for predicting binding sites involved in protein-protein interactions.

tools.name: 3D-Generative-SBDD
tools.one_line_profile: 3D Generative Model for Structure-Based Drug Design
tools.detailed_description: A generative model for designing drug molecules in 3D based on protein structures, published at NeurIPS 2021.

tools.name: DTINet
tools.one_line_profile: Network Integration for Drug-Target Interaction Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A network integration approach to predict drug-target interactions by combining heterogeneous information.

tools.name: KDBNet
tools.one_line_profile: Kinase-drug binding prediction with uncertainty quantification
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model for predicting kinase-drug binding affinities with calibrated uncertainty quantification.

tools.name: drprg
tools.one_line_profile: Drug Resistance Prediction with Reference Graphs
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting drug resistance using reference graphs, implemented in Rust for performance.

tools.name: efindsite
tools.one_line_profile: Ligand binding site prediction and virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting ligand binding sites and performing virtual screening, developed by the Brylinski Lab.

tools.name: clamp
tools.one_line_profile: Language-enhanced activity prediction models for drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: Code for enhancing activity prediction models in drug discovery by incorporating natural language understanding capabilities.

tools.name: lsc
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale comparison of ML methods for drug target prediction
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking library and codebase for comparing various machine learning methods for drug target prediction on ChEMBL data.

tools.name: FAME.AL
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning for sites of metabolism prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool using active learning to predict sites of metabolism in molecules, developed by the Pharmacoinformatics group at Univ. Vienna.

tools.name: deepsite-mirror
tools.one_line_profile: Mirror of DeepSite binding site prediction service
tools.detailed_description: A TypeScript implementation/mirror of the DeepSite tool for predicting protein binding sites, facilitating access to the model.

tools.name: drugresponseeval
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for evaluating drug response prediction models
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for statistically and biologically sound testing and evaluation of drug response prediction models.

tools.name: GEFA
tools.one_line_profile: Early Fusion Approach in Drug-Target Affinity Prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the GEFA model which uses an early fusion approach for predicting drug-target affinities.

tools.name: EquiDock
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric deep learning for rigid 3D protein-protein docking
tools.detailed_description: A geometric deep learning model for fast and accurate rigid body protein-protein docking.

tools.name: Cloud-Bind
tools.one_line_profile: Cloud-based Drug Binding Structure Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A cloud-based tool/notebook for predicting drug binding structures, facilitating accessible computational chemistry.

tools.name: DrugBAN
tools.one_line_profile: Bilinear attention network for drug-target prediction
tools.detailed_description: An interpretable bilinear attention network model with domain adaptation for improving drug-target interaction prediction.

tools.name: Pocket2Mol
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient Molecular Sampling Based on 3D Protein Pockets
tools.detailed_description: A generative model for efficient sampling of molecules conditioned on 3D protein pocket structures.

tools.name: e3moldiffusion
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion-based structure-based drug design
tools.detailed_description: A research repository from Pfizer for diffusion-based models applied to structure-based drug design.

tools.name: pocket_detection
tools.one_line_profile: Protein pocket detection tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for detecting pockets in protein structures, developed by Preferred Networks research.

tools.name: SimSite3D
tools.one_line_profile: 3D binding site similarity search tool
tools.detailed_description: Software for searching databases of 3D structures to find binding sites with steric and chemical similarities to a query site.

tools.name: UniSite
tools.one_line_profile: End-to-End Ligand Binding Site Detection Framework
tools.detailed_description: A cross-structure dataset and learning framework for end-to-end detection of ligand binding sites.

tools.name: P2Rank
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning-based ligand binding site prediction
tools.detailed_description: A standalone command-line tool for predicting ligand binding sites from protein structures using machine learning.

tools.name: 3DProtDTA
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for drug-target affinity prediction using residue-level protein graphs
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework that predicts drug-target affinity (DTA) by leveraging residue-level protein graph representations and 3D structural information, aiming to improve interaction prediction accuracy.

tools.name: Drug-Drug-Interaction-Prediction
tools.one_line_profile: DDI prediction model using Knowledge Graph Embeddings and Conv-LSTM
tools.detailed_description: A computational model for predicting drug-drug interactions (DDIs) by combining knowledge graph embeddings with Convolutional-LSTM networks to capture both structural and sequential patterns in drug data.

tools.name: CryptoSite
tools.one_line_profile: Library for prediction of cryptic binding sites in proteins
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to identify cryptic binding sites—pockets that are not apparent in unbound protein structures but form upon ligand binding—using structural analysis and machine learning.

tools.name: ConPLex
tools.one_line_profile: Contrastive learning model for drug-target interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: A method adapting protein language models and contrastive learning to predict drug-target interactions with high accuracy, enabling zero-shot prediction capabilities for novel targets.

tools.name: AF-cryptic-pocket
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for cryptic pocket prediction using AlphaFold 2
tools.detailed_description: A computational workflow that leverages AlphaFold 2 to generate protein conformational ensembles, facilitating the detection of cryptic pockets that are relevant for drug discovery.

tools.name: Pocket2Drug
tools.one_line_profile: Generative model to predict binding drugs for ligand-binding sites
tools.detailed_description: A generative deep learning framework that takes protein pocket structures as input and generates potential binding drug molecules, facilitating structure-based de novo drug design.

tools.name: GGNN_Meets_PLM
tools.one_line_profile: Integration of protein language models into geometric deep learning
tools.detailed_description: A framework combining pre-trained protein language models with geometric graph neural networks to enhance the representation learning of proteins for downstream tasks like affinity prediction.

tools.name: DeepSurf
tools.one_line_profile: Surface-based deep learning for ligand binding site prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool that utilizes protein surface representations to predict potential ligand binding sites, focusing on geometric and chemical features of the protein surface.

tools.name: CPA
tools.one_line_profile: Compositional Perturbation Autoencoder for single-cell drug response
tools.detailed_description: A deep generative framework to learn and predict the effects of perturbations (e.g., drugs) at the single-cell level, capable of estimating dose-response curves and handling unseen drug combinations.

tools.name: PocketAnchor
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-based pocket representations for interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model that learns anchor-based representations of protein pockets to improve the accuracy of protein-ligand interaction predictions.

tools.name: DeepPBS
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric deep learning for protein-DNA binding specificity
tools.detailed_description: A geometric deep learning framework designed to predict protein-DNA binding specificity and binding sites by analyzing the structural interface between proteins and DNA.

tools.name: GrASP
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Attention Site Prediction for druggable binding sites
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network model with attention mechanisms (GrASP) for identifying druggable binding sites on protein structures, focusing on capturing long-range dependencies in protein graphs.

tools.name: TGSA
tools.one_line_profile: Twin Graph Neural Networks for drug response prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model utilizing protein-protein association-based twin graph neural networks with similarity augmentation to predict drug responses in cancer cell lines.

tools.name: DeepDrug
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based deep learning framework for drug relation prediction
tools.detailed_description: A general framework using graph convolutional networks to predict various drug relations, including drug-drug interactions and drug-target interactions, by modeling molecular structures.

tools.name: iDeep
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated prediction of RNA-protein binding sites using deep learning
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework integrating multiple data sources (sequence, structure) to predict RNA-protein binding sites, utilizing Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) and Deep Belief Networks (DBNs).

tools.name: KGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge Graph Neural Network for DDI prediction
tools.detailed_description: A model that leverages Knowledge Graph Neural Networks to predict drug-drug interactions by capturing high-order structural information and semantic relations in the knowledge graph.

tools.name: NucleusDiff
tools.one_line_profile: Nucleus-level denoising diffusion model for structure-based drug design
tools.detailed_description: A generative diffusion model that operates at the nucleus level (manifold-constrained) for generating 3D drug molecules within protein pockets, aiming for high structural validity and affinity.

tools.name: AttentionSiteDTI
tools.one_line_profile: Attention-based model for DTI prediction using binding sites
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model that predicts drug-target interactions by using graph representations of ligands and the 3D structure of protein binding sites, enhanced by an attention mechanism.

tools.name: DeepDrugDomain
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for DTI prediction and binding affinity estimation
tools.detailed_description: A versatile Python toolkit designed for streamlining the preprocessing of drug-target data and training deep learning models for interaction prediction and binding affinity estimation.

tools.name: DeepCSeqSite
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-ligand binding sites prediction toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based toolkit for predicting protein-ligand binding sites from protein sequences, utilizing convolutional neural networks to capture sequence motifs.

tools.name: SumGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-typed drug interaction prediction via knowledge graph summarization
tools.detailed_description: A graph neural network model that efficiently predicts multi-typed drug interactions by summarizing knowledge graphs, handling the complexity of diverse interaction types.

tools.name: DrugGPS
tools.one_line_profile: Learning subpocket prototypes for generalizable structure-based drug design
tools.detailed_description: A method for structure-based drug design that learns subpocket prototypes to improve the generalizability of generated molecules to novel protein pockets.

tools.name: FAIR
tools.one_line_profile: Full atom protein pocket design via iterative refinement
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for designing full-atom protein pockets through an iterative refinement process, enabling the creation of novel binding sites with specific geometric properties.

tools.name: PocketFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Generative model for protein pocket generation using prior-informed flow matching
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the NeurIPS 2024 paper 'Generalized Protein Pocket Generation with Prior-Informed Flow Matching'. It utilizes flow matching techniques to generate valid and druggable protein pockets, aiding in structure-based drug design.

tools.name: PocketGen
tools.one_line_profile: Deep generative model for full-atom ligand-binding protein pocket generation
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning method for generating full-atom ligand-binding protein pockets. It combines geometric deep learning with generative modeling to create realistic binding sites for drug discovery applications.

tools.name: HyperAttentionDTI
tools.one_line_profile: Attention-based deep learning model for drug-protein interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: A sequence-based deep learning framework utilizing attention mechanisms to predict drug-protein interactions (DTI). It aims to improve prediction accuracy by focusing on critical parts of protein and drug sequences.

tools.name: GeoBind
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric deep learning for nucleic acid binding interface segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A geometric deep learning method for segmenting nucleic acid binding interfaces on protein surfaces. It predicts binding sites by analyzing the geometric and chemical features of the protein surface.

tools.name: SWnet
tools.one_line_profile: Drug response prediction from cancer genomic signatures and chemical structures
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model designed to predict drug responses based on cancer genomic signatures and compound chemical structures. It integrates self-attention mechanisms to model the interactions between biological and chemical features.
